events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but I want to return it because the size is completely wrong and doesn’t fit me at all.
The reported issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to the customer's request for a return.
Assigning the case to a customer support agent specialized in refunds and returns for further handling.
Hello! I see you would like to return your jacket due to a sizing issue. I’m here to help you with that.
Could you please confirm the order number and whether the jacket has been worn or damaged so we can proceed with the return?
Thanks for the quick reply. The order number is 987654321, and the jacket is completely new and unworn.
Great, I have initiated the return process for your jacket. Please use the prepaid shipping label we emailed you to send it back.
That's perfect, thank you. I'll print the label and send the jacket back today.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your statement within 5-7 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and are satisfied with the resolution of your return request.
Since your refund has been completed and no further issues were reported, we are now closing your support case.
